How many people are affected by Rotor syndrome ?,"Rotor syndrome is a rare condition, although its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Rotor syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Rotor syndrome ?,"The SLCO1B1 and SLCO1B3 genes are involved in Rotor syndrome. Mutations in both genes are required for the condition to occur. The SLCO1B1 and SLCO
